description: This file defines a set of React components and hooks for a sidebar UI element, including context management, toggle controls, and various subcomponents such as menu items, headers, footers, and buttons. It is part of a larger React project, likely a web application, and manages sidebar state, styling, and interactions.

classes.name: SidebarContext
classes.description: React context for managing sidebar state and behavior.

classes.name: SidebarProvider
classes.description: Component that provides sidebar state and controls via React context, including toggle, open/close, and keyboard shortcut handling.

classes.name: Sidebar
classes.description: Main sidebar component that renders differently based on device type, collapsibility, and variant, including mobile and desktop behaviors.

classes.name: SidebarTrigger
classes.description: Button component to toggle the sidebar, with accessibility features.

classes.name: SidebarRail
classes.description: Component for a collapsible sidebar rail, typically a narrow strip for toggling.

classes.name: SidebarInset
classes.description: Main content area styled for inset sidebar variant.

classes.name: SidebarInput
classes.description: Styled input component within the sidebar.

classes.name: SidebarHeader
classes.description: Header section for the sidebar.

classes.name: SidebarFooter
classes.description: Footer section for the sidebar.

classes.name: SidebarSeparator
classes.description: Visual separator component for sidebar layout.

classes.name: SidebarContent
classes.description: Main content container for sidebar content.

classes.name: SidebarGroup
classes.description: Component for grouping related sidebar items.

classes.name: SidebarGroupLabel
classes.description: Label for a sidebar group.

classes.name: SidebarGroupAction
classes.description: Action button for a sidebar group.

classes.name: SidebarGroupContent
classes.description: Content area within a sidebar group.

classes.name: SidebarMenu
classes.description: Container for sidebar menu items.

classes.name: SidebarMenuItem
classes.description: Individual menu item in the sidebar.

classes.name: sidebarMenuButtonVariants
classes.description: Variant styling configuration for menu buttons.

classes.name: SidebarMenuButton
classes.description: Button component for sidebar menu items, supporting tooltips and active state.

classes.name: SidebarMenuAction
classes.description: Action button for menu items, with hover and focus styles.

classes.name: SidebarMenuBadge
classes.description: Badge indicator for menu items.

classes.name: SidebarMenuSkeleton
classes.description: Skeleton placeholder for loading menu items.

classes.name: SidebarMenuSub
classes.description: Submenu container for nested menu items.

classes.name: SidebarMenuSubItem
classes.description: Submenu item.

classes.name: SidebarMenuSubButton
classes.description: Button for submenu items, supporting active state and icons.
